languages.text: "Ты не зря скрываешь свое уродство от окружающих. Как можно искалечить себя столь омерзительным образом!"

traits.locale_text: "Ты не зря скрываешь свое уродство от окружающих. Как можно искалечить себя столь омерзительным образом!"

languages.text: "You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner?"
languages.original_text: "Ты не зря скрываешь свое уродство от окружающих. Как можно искалечить себя столь омерзительным образом!"

traits.locale_text: "You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner!"
"You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner!"
"You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner?"
"You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner?"
"You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner?"

languages.text: “你没有让其他人看到这畸形的秘密，这是正确的做法。你怎么能以这么恐怖的方式残害你自己？”
languages.original_text: "You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner?"

traits.locale_text: “你没有让其他人看到这畸形的秘密，这是正确的做法。你怎么能以这么恐怖的方式残害你自己？”

languages.text: «Hace bien en ocultar su desfiguración a los demás. ¿Cómo ha podido mutilarse de forma tan espantosa?».
languages.original_text: "You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner?"

traits.locale_text: «Hace bien en ocultar su desfiguración a los demás. ¿Cómo ha podido mutilarse de forma tan espantosa?».

languages.text: 「己の醜態を皆から隠すのは正しいことだ。よくもあのようなおぞましい方法で己を傷つけることができたものだな？」
languages.original_text: "You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner?"

traits.locale_text: 「己の醜態を皆から隠すのは正しいことだ。よくもあのようなおぞましい方法で己を傷つけることができたものだな？」

languages.text: "Ihr tut gut daran, Eure Entstellung vor allen anderen zu verbergen. Wie könnt Ihr Euch selbst auf so grausame Art verschandeln?"
languages.original_text: "You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr tut gut daran, Eure Entstellung vor allen anderen zu verbergen. Wie könnt Ihr Euch selbst auf so grausame Art verschandeln?"

languages.text: « Vous avez raison de cacher vos difformités comme vous le faites. Comment avez-vous pu vous mutiler de façon aussi ignoble ? »
languages.original_text: "You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison de cacher vos difformités comme vous le faites. Comment avez-vous pu vous mutiler de façon aussi ignoble ? »

languages.text: "Biçimsizliğini herkesten gizlemekte haklıymışsın. Kendini böylesine tiksindirici bir şekle nasıl sokabildin?"
languages.original_text: "You are right to hide your disfigurement from everyone else. How could you maim yourself in such a gruesome manner?"

traits.locale_text: "Biçimsizliğini herkesten gizlemekte haklıymışsın. Kendini böylesine tiksindirici bir şekle nasıl sokabildin?"
